description: This creamy chicken dish is hearty and rich, and ticks all the boxes when it comes to comfort food.
name: Cheatâ€™s Honey Mustard Chicken Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 qty slow cooker honey mustard chicken, thawed overnight in fridge, if necessary
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain.

Meanwhile, grease an 8-cup baking dish. Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over high heat. Cook onion and thyme for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until onion has softened. Add spinach and cook for 1 minute or until wilted.
Preheat grill to high. Combine milk, cream, chicken and half of the cheese with onion mixture. Bring to a boil. Remove pan from heat. Stir in pasta. Season.
Transfer pasta mixture to dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Grill for 4 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with parsley.
